    • getHistory

      public List<String> getHistory()
      Returns a list of previously saved simulation names.

      list of simulation history entries

    • startSimulation

      public void startSimulation(int param1, int param2, int param3, int param4, int param5, long seed, String distribution)
      Initializes and starts a new simulation run with the given parameters. Configures service points, resets global state, and starts the simulation thread.
      Specified by:
      startSimulation in interface IControllerVtoM
      Parameters:
      param1 - number of planning service points
      param2 - number of implementation service points
      param3 - number of testing service points
      param4 - number of reviewing service points
      param5 - number of presentation service points
      seed - random seed for reproducibility
      distribution - distribution type used for event generation

    • setSpeed

      public void setSpeed(double delay)
      Adjusts the simulation speed by setting a custom delay value.
      Parameters:
      delay - the delay between simulation steps in milliseconds

    • increaseSpeed

      public void increaseSpeed()
      Increases the simulation speed by lengthening the delay.

    • decreaseSpeed

      Decreases the simulation speed by shortening the delay.

    • updateCounters

      public void updateCounters(ServicePointController[] servicePointControllers)
      Updates the counter displays in the view using data from the engine.
      Parameters:
      servicePointControllers - the array of service point controllers containing live data

    • terminate

      public void terminate()
      Stops the running simulation safely and joins the simulation thread.

    • setParameters

      public void setParameters(int param1, int param2, int param3, int param4, int param5, long seed)
      Updates engine parameters for a future simulation run. Currently not used directly in this implementation.
      Parameters:
      param1 - planners
      param2 - implementers
      param3 - testers
      param4 - reviewers
      param5 - presenters
      seed - random seed for reproducibility

    • saveRun

      public SimulationRun saveRun(int param1, int param2, int param3, int param4, int param5, long seed, long ts, String distribution)
      Saves a completed simulation configuration and run data to the database.
      Parameters:
      param1 - planners
      param2 - implementers
      param3 - testers
      param4 - reviewers
      param5 - presenters
      seed - random seed
      ts - timestamp of the simulation
      distribution - distribution type used
      Returns:
      the saved SimulationRun entity
